items.sentence: My father speaks better French than my mother.
Mary is the only girl I\'ve ever really loved.
Tom told me you were with my son when he died.
Tom took a picture of himself with his iPhone.
Tom travels around the world playing concerts.
Tom tried to force the pieces to fit together.
Mary and Alice are often mistaken for sisters.
Mary and Alice fell in love with the same man.
Mary and her mom live in a very old apartment.
Mary asked Tom to pretend to be her boyfriend.
